label: Caves Of Dragonmount 11
description:
Chester, being the gentleman dragon he is, won't enter Ember's home. He tries to call to out to her, instead.  Not receiving a response, he raps loudly on the cave entrance.  When she still doesn't answer, decides to go back to the skies!

Hit 1 to take to the skies in order to continue the search!

Hit 0 to quit.
